issues.title: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds
issues.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds

any.message: Element has insufficient color contrast of 1.12 (foreground color: #add8e6, background color: #dddddd, font size: 12.0pt (16px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 1.13:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #3c6775.

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 1.13:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #3c6775.
original_issue.selector: html > body > div > main > div:nth-child(3) > ul:nth-child(4) > li:nth-child(1) > a

issues.title: Background and foreground colors do not have a sufficient contrast ratio.
issues.description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read. [Learn how to provide sufficient color contrast](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/color-contrast).

automatic.name: Headings; Wrong Order, Empty & Missing Headings;

issues.title: Page should contain a level-one heading
issues.description: Ensure that the page, or at least one of its frames contains a level-one heading

all.message: Page must have a level-one heading

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix all of the following:
  Page must have a level-one heading

automatic.name: Size; Target Size; Element too small

issues.title: Touch targets do not have sufficient size or spacing.
issues.description: Touch targets with sufficient size and spacing help users who may have difficulty targeting small controls to activate the targets. [Learn more about touch targets](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/target-size).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Target has insufficient size (93.4px by 17px, should be at least 24px by 24px)
  Target has insufficient space to its closest neighbors. Safe clickable space has a diameter of 12px instead of at least 24px.
